com.zebra.sdk.zmotif.device

Interface DeviceUtilZmotif

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ZebraPrinterZmotif

    public interface DeviceUtilZmotif
    Interface to ZMotif printer utility functions

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AlarmInfo clearError()
      Clears the printer error and returns the printer alarm information.
      void clearRejectBinCounter()
      Clears the printer's Reject Bin counter.

      Queries the printer and returns the available card types.

      Queries the printer and returns the memory available for job storage.

      Queries the printer and returns the card type information for specified card type.

      Queries the printer and returns the specified log.

      Queries the printer and returns the Wireless Status.

      Queries the printer's configuration and returns true if printer includes barcode reader.

      Gets the Access points discoverable by printer.

    • Method Detail

      • clearError

        AlarmInfo clearError()
                     throws ConnectionException,
                            ZebraCardException
        Clears the printer error and returns the printer alarm information.
        Returns:
        the alarm information.
        • refer to ZebraCardErrors for list of error codes and descriptions
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.

      • clearRejectBinCounter

        void clearRejectBinCounter()
                           throws ConnectionException,
                                  SettingsException,
                                  ZebraCardException
        Clears the printer's Reject Bin counter.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if there is an issue clearing the reject bin count.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.

      • getAvailableCardTypes

        java.util.List<String> getAvailableCardTypes()
                                             throws ConnectionException,
                                                    SettingsException,
                                                    ZebraCardException
        Queries the printer and returns the available card types.
        Returns:
        list of Card Types.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if there is an error retrieving the available card types.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.

      • getAvailableMemory

        MemoryInfo getAvailableMemory()
                              throws ConnectionException,
                                     SettingsException,
                                     ZebraCardException
        Queries the printer and returns the memory available for job storage.
        Returns:
        the printer's available memory.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if there is an error retrieving the available memory.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.

      • getCardTypeInformation

        CardTypeInfo getCardTypeInformation(String cardType)
                                    throws ConnectionException,
                                           SettingsException,
                                           ZebraCardException,
                                           ZebraIllegalArgumentException
        Queries the printer and returns the card type information for specified card type.
        Parameters:
        cardType - - type of card.
        Returns:
        information about a specified card type.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if there is an error retrieving the card type information.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.
        ZebraIllegalArgumentException - if the cardType specified is invalid.

      • getLog

        String getLog(LogType logType,
            boolean clearLog)
              throws ConnectionException,
                     ZebraCardException
        Queries the printer and returns the specified log.
        Parameters:
        logType - the type of log.
        clearLog - true to clear the log or not.
        Returns:
        the log in XML form.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.

      • getWirelessRadioStatus

        java.util.Map<String,String> getWirelessRadioStatus()
                                                    throws ConnectionException,
                                                           SettingsException,
                                                           ZebraCardException
        Queries the printer and returns the Wireless Radio Status.
        Returns:
        map of Wireless Radio Status.
        • Key = Wireless Radio Setting
        • Value = Setting value
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the wireless radio status.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.

      • getWirelessStatus

        java.util.Map<String,String> getWirelessStatus()
                                               throws ConnectionException,
                                                      SettingsException,
                                                      ZebraCardException
        Queries the printer and returns the Wireless Status.
        Returns:
        map of Wireless Status.
        • Key = Wireless Setting
        • Value = Setting value
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the wireless status.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.

      • resumeFromStandby

        void resumeFromStandby()
                       throws ConnectionException,
                              ZebraCardException
        Resume from standby.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.

      • scanWirelessAccessPoints

        java.util.List<WirelessAccessPointInfo> scanWirelessAccessPoints(int scanIterations)
                                                                 throws ConnectionException,
                                                                        SettingsException,
                                                                        ZebraCardException
        Gets the Access points discoverable by printer.
        Parameters:
        scanIterations - number of scan iterations.
        Returns:
        list of WirelessAccessPointInfo.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the available access points.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.

      • hasBarcodeReader

        boolean hasBarcodeReader()
                         throws ConnectionException,
                                SettingsException,
                                ZebraCardException
        Queries the printer's configuration and returns true if printer includes barcode reader.
        Returns:
        true if printer configuration includes a barcode reader.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the barcode reader information.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.

      • isHostAuthenticationEnabled

        boolean isHostAuthenticationEnabled()
                                    throws ConnectionException
        Returns whether host authentication mode is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if host authentication is enabled.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.

      • isEncryptionEnabled

        boolean isEncryptionEnabled()
                            throws ConnectionException
        Returns whether encryption is enabled on the printer.
        Returns:
        true if encryption is enabled.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.

      • resetNetwork

        void resetNetwork()
                  throws ConnectionException,
                         SettingsException,
                         ZebraCardException
        Sends the network reset command to the printer.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        ZebraCardException - if the printer model is not supported or a printer error occurs.
        SettingsException
